    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • isSupported

        public static boolean isSupported(JWEAlg alg)
        Check whether the given JWE algorithm is supported by Authlete.

        This method returns true when the given JWE algorithm is one of the following.

        1. RSA1_5
        2. RSA-OAEP
        3. RSA-OAEP-256
        4. A128KW
        5. A192KW
        6. A256KW
        7. A128GCMKW
        8. A192GCMKW
        9. A256GCMKW
        10. dir
        Parameters:
        alg - A JWE algorithm.
        Returns:
        true if the given JWE algorithm is supported by Authlete. false if the given JWE algorithm is not supported by Authlete. When null is given, this method returns false.
